question: Sadakat Ashram memorial in Patna is dedicated to which former President of India ?
explanation: Sadaqat Ashram is located on the banks of the River Ganges in Patna, Bihar. The fist President of India Dr. Rajendra Prasad, used to live here. In the year 1921, it was established by Mahatma Gandhi. Jayaprakash Narayan (Lok Nayak ) launched his historic movement from the Sadaqat Ashram after India's independence.
